_header: God and saint Trinity / As I believe on thee
_description: A prayer and conjuration against robbers — four couplets

BodLauMis685.First Lines:
God and the holy treniteas veryly as I beleve yn
                    the…
BodLauMis685.Last Lines:
…Crist for thyn holy namyskep me from all harmys &
                    gramys

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
God and Sient triniteAs I by lyue on thefor thy grace &
                    for thy myȝtSaue me lorde boþe by day &
                    nyȝt…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…by the vertu to thy ryȝt armeSave me lorde fro al
                    harme
CULAdd5943.Note: Followed immediately by 2155 as if part of the same work.
